main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 17 March 1949 in the Armenoi Area, Rethimnon, Crete. Native observers reported a disc-shaped object at an altitude of 1000 meters, exhibiting unusual buzzing sounds from various directions before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped and had a size comparable to that of a bicycle wheel.
Observers noted the spreading of reports similar to prominent US sightings in 1947, implying a global trend in UFO sightings.
The source comments on the imagination of the natives, suggesting a level of credibility for their reports.
The UFO was observed to have a NE to SW flight path at a speed that is not specified.
The observers recorded an effect on clouds and were captivated by the object's luminosity.
sighted object: a disc-shaped UFO at an altitude of 1000 meters
